website_summaries.verdict: One of the more popular outdoor wooden dog houses available, this high-quality model is sure to impress.
pros: Comes with both red or white option
Can hold dogs up to 80 pounds
Roof is slanted to keep rain out of house
Option to purchase insulation kit for interior
cons: Many customers complained about the product's sub-par paint job

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY GREAT. I recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSLY GREAT. I recommend this product to anyone. Especially senior dogs. A large and small dog EASILY and HAPPILY fit. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: After 2 attempts for the shipping carrier to get this to me it finally arrived. I assembled it myself (62 y/o female) in about an hour. Very easy to assemble. I slapped a coat of white paint on the trim because it looked like only primer was applied and it looks great. Put my sweet dog's name on a wooden plate and nailed it above the door. Now trying to convince him it is a great place to be - still working on it ( he is only 12 weeks old). I have a red brick house and this looks very nice as an addition. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Hill

customer_reviews.title: like with the plastic 'igloo' doghouse we had to return
customer_reviews.text: At first we were worried because our dog wouldn't go inside, like with the plastic 'igloo' doghouse we had to return, and we thought we wasted our money. But once we opened up the lid, so he could see it was not just a 'black hole' he went inside right away. He loves his dog house when it's raining. I like the adjustable legs for uneven surfaces. It was pretty easy to put together - my husband wasn't cursing up a blue streak, as is the norm when he assembles items. It is a very attractive burgundy color and has withstood the elements, and it's been 6 months since the purchase date.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this sweet little house! I bought it for my three feral kittens and there is more than enough room. The floor isn't airtight but with the nice comfy pad I put in it, it will keep them plenty warm. It was super easy to put together. All the parts were with it and all of the pre drilled holes lined up! (thank goodness) I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S.

customer_reviews.title: If I weren’t 8 months pregnant I would go to Lowe’s and buy better quality wood for half the price to build
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large, received a medium.. I also paid $30 extra for expedited shipping.. $210 later, I’m frustrated. I opened it to take the measurements to make sure, it is in fact medium. It’s also the cheapest wood possible. If I weren’t 8 months pregnant I would go to Lowe’s and buy better quality wood for half the price to build. Now y German Shepard doesn’t have a dog house and we are in Southern California with rains all week. So careless. I paid extra for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Soaked!!  Not weather proof at all!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these houses and were super excited. They look nice and seemed sturdy. Put them together, dogs went in fine...all was good! Then it rained!!!!! Poor Pups!! Came home from work and all of them were drenched!!!! The beds inside were drenched. Just completely soaked. Super bummed as they were not cheap. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: ANITA DOMINGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Hinges rusted and broke after one year
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a great dog house. But after one year the hinges to lift the roof rusted and broke. Replacing for another brand after a year and a half as the frame around the roof has separated from the rest and allows rain to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great house for small dogs that are not destructive.
customer_reviews.text: So it's lightweight balsa type wood (maybe a little stronger, but not by much); however, if you have small dogs this is a great dog house. The instructions are clear enough, and I added wood glue to all the joints to ensure a sturdy fit. If you have a dog that chews wood, probably not a good house for you. But if you have a mellow 15-30 lb dog, this is a good fit (I got the small). It will also accommodate two under 10lb dogs...the Ikea small dog bed fits perfectly inside.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#10M

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of wood
customer_reviews.text: Split poor quality wood, only primed so needs to be re-painted. For the price it’s a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sandoceansun

customer_reviews.title: Really nice dog/kitty house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and keeps my stray kitty very dry. Very solid construction materials and I am exceptionally happy with it. I'm an older woman and had no problems putting it together at all, although I didn't attach the roof hardware, just the hinges and it works perfectly fine without them. The house is solid and will last for many years, I am very pleased with it. A wee part of my roof came damaged and the seller promptly sent me a new roof.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The directions were a little confusing. I accidentally put in one of the walls backwards because I couldn’t understand how they wanted me to install it. But otherwise I was able to construct it by myself. Nice, sturdy dog house. I really like it. Attractive too. But my dog is scared of it and refuses to go inside. She witnessed me lifting the roof up and then bringing it down. That was traumatic for her. She now thinks its some sort of doggy snare. We’ll try again come winter. My dog is special. I’m sure yours won’t be scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house! My 100lb 7 month old German Rottweiler puppy absolutely loves it. He fits in it perfectly and still has extra room to turn around and stand up inside of it. Easy to put together, quick delivery, and great material. Overall great product, will definitely recommend and purchase again for another dog.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Wood is very thin. Hinges on roof are very weak. Might be okay for a very sheltered "outside" area, but not appropriate to protect your dog from the elements. Also, it should come with anchors. It's so light (made that cheaply) it blows over in the slightest breeze. Unfortunately for us, our 1 y/o Border Collie was in his house when the wind blew it over, and now he's deathly afraid of dog houses.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.R. Deyo

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house, wish my dog would use it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this house to try to keep my dog from climbing under our deck. The kit came with everything i needed and was pretty easy to put together. Although i do have a good amount of experience with DIY. There was a strong paint smell that took a few days to dissipate, but that's to be expected. I like the raised floor which can be removed, and the hinged roof. Unfortunately, my dog has no interest in it, even two months later. My daughter has spent more time playing in it than he has. Oh well. I tried.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoProud

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large dog (110 pound Great Pyrenees/Anatolian Shephard mix) and was skeptical it would be big enough. It's plenty big and comfy to boot. The fact that you can open the top makes it great for checking on your dog or cleaning. We bought the liner separately for warmth. Took about an hour to put together. The instructions are clear except when they tell you to "nail" something with a screw. Other than that, it's pretty straightforward. The dog house looks well-designed and elegant. Don't know about weatherproofing further with a waterproof stain as we keep this under an outdoor awning, however it might be a good idea if it is 100% exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Neruda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy! Floorboards cracked as soon as my 25lbs pitbull puppy got in it. Several chips throughout. Discolored spots straight out of the box, not constructed correctly. Although it states it can hold a large dog, I can’t imagine it will last once my growing pup reaches average weight.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Barrios-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large house. It was easy to assemble, and looks nice. The reason I did not give it five stars is the floor is flimsy. My dog is only 50 lbs but I still added a thin sheet of wood over the floor to help distribute the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cat house!
customer_reviews.text: Nice house. I bought it for the feral cat family in my back yard. I cut out part of the back wall and installed a pet door so the cats would have an emergency exit of they needed it. The wood is pretty light weight, but it went together well. The paint stain was pretty thin, so i painted it inside and out. Looks nice and i think the extra touches will help it hold up to the weather better. Only problem is I don't think the cats are using it. I just hated to have hem sleeping out in the old. I know, I'm a crazy cat lady!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Cullinan

customer_reviews.title: It arrived right on estimated time packaging was great absolutely no damage it was pretty easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on estimated time packaging was great absolutely no damage it was pretty easy to put together smells great my dog loved it right away. The only reason I give it three stars horrible paint job I don't know who painted this but spackle to red unfinished white there's no reason why I paid so much for something I'd have to touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Flores

customer_reviews.title: It's great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for over a good year plus now. We read the reviews and decided to purchase anyways. Have found that yes, the dogs can easily chew the door framing so we went to the hardware store and lined the door with one inch metal flat bars that did the trick. Because our babies are indoor babies, we mostly use it for when we let them play outside for an extended time or to run into when they HAVE to go potty and want to get out of the rain. No, it's not perfect, but we're too lazy to make one and for two tiny little dogs..., it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dog House
customer_reviews.text: The dog house is nice, sturdy and relatively easy to put together. I love that the top opens up and the bottom comes out. The dog house went together easily, though having two of us (me and my wife) put it together was better than doing one. The only negative was in fitting G (middle floor) into the floor. The middle slat underneath was a bit too long to fit over the two added feet. I had to chisel off about 1/8th of an inch of that slat to make it fit. One of the outside screw holes on the D part was split. I made it work. Still, a nice sturdy dog house
customer_reviews.author: DS321

customer_reviews.title: Cheap as it gets. Can hear the wood panels ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap as it gets. Can hear the wood panels crack when my dog (40 pounds) steps onto it. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: SkoomaKing

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as sturdy as expected. Looks nice, roof is solid, flooring...not so much. Needs a bit more structure. The supporting legs for the middle of the flooring are just barely in place. They actually lay sideways a bit when the dog house is shifted. However, size is great for my massive bloodhound. Not sure about ordering another unless they are stated to be a bit more of a sound structure...just too many areas of it don't seem secured. Construction was simple. I, a small woman, put it together alone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE :BUY NOTHING FROM PETSFIT w/o thinking twice.They lie.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote and asked these ????s. Petsfit said the shelter was weatherproof .The wood is raw. Truth: It needs to be varnished by you.Petsfit said the bars could come off the window. Truth: Also They can't. They don't even turn. Removing the whole window & sill cannot be done w/o harming the wall.Also some of the holes in walls were drilled crooked. Not all pieces fit flush. The top did not close flat. This size is perfect for a large cat. Dog? better be lap size. Took over over 2hrs to assemble. This cost tooo$$$$ for the product. Worse they lied.
customer_reviews.author: cheriese j lane nordling

customer_reviews.title: Great tortoise home for winter
customer_reviews.text: Used for young sulcata African tortoise as her winter home. This structure is very sturdy, plenty of room for a chicken coop heat source and reptile lights easy to clamp to ceiling (roof raises up). Needs a ramp, easy to do with plywood. My tortoise comes in/out of the plastic curtain just fine and can turn around inside just fine. Leak proof with all the rain this winter. Not in a snowy area of the country, but hub has checked on the chicken coop heater and lights often and the structure is nice and warm. I like that it is off the ground to allow for rain to flow under it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Now if we can get the pupper to dig it....
customer_reviews.text: It helps to have two people assemble this---it's not heavy, just awkward. Don't tighten the bolts holding the sides together until you've got them all in, and then tighten in an alternating pattern (as you do when changing a tire). If you're tempted to open it inside to find the instructions, be aware that grit from the shingles will be in your home. The gas springs hold the roof up very well; it will not slam down. The instructions refer to everything as a "component," but the pictures make it very clear what is what. So far, the dog seems to think it's haunted, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer1013

customer_reviews.title: Read no more, your dogs will love you!
customer_reviews.text: After doing my dog house homework, I chose this one! And if you are reading review after review like I was...read no more! This dog house is the best out there. Highly recommend it. It took my husband less than 30 minutes to assemble it. It is very sturdy & our dogs love it. We ordered the large size and our two dogs fit perfectly in it. One is a lab mix and the other is a terrier mix. It does have some small spaces between the boards on the bottom, most likely for ventilation but we put the dog's bedding down so it wasn't a big deal. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: MadDispatcherFC

customer_reviews.title: Good dog house, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: We love this dog house. Like other reviews, it’s not going to last you forever but the quality is good enough & it’s super easy to put together. It looks wonderful too! Our 90lb Shepherd seems to be enjoying it & there’s plenty of room for him & his bed. I’d have given 5 stars if the wood was just a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: britt foster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doghouse
customer_reviews.text: We've been wanting to get a doghouse for a long time for our two Boston terriers, and when I found this I thought it was perfect! First the product came a week or so earlier than expected, which was awesome, and second it was very easy to assemble. I love the fact that you can open from the top and actually see what's inside the doghouse vs not knowing what may be in there. I also like how easy it is to clean. Our dogs were hesitant at first to go in, but now they realize it gives them a place to rest, shade from the sun and shelter from the rain. Plus it's a really cute doghouse :)
customer_reviews.author: Dee Vee 81

customer_reviews.title: Cant get the kids out of it or the cats off it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 cats to have a shelter to hide in since they liked the dog's little one so much. They hang out in it and on top of it. Its a great sunning patio for the cats. The opening lid makes it easy to clean out spiders and webs when necessary and our 9 yr old opens the top to get inside and hide from his brother. It holds quite a bit of weight. It is sturdy and a teen put it together with a little help from his father.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves his new house. At first it was difficult to get him inside, but once he realized it was his space to lounge in - he is constantly snuggled up in it. I bought it as a way to get him out of the cold. While it is not insulated like I was led to believe, it is still a nice break from the cold breeze and up off the ground. Love that the roof is on hinges - I haven't installed the hydrolic lifts yet, but they aren't even entirely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm happy with this Dog House.
customer_reviews.text: The Dog House came complete, and was well packaged. It was very easy to assembly, and all the pre-drilled holes lines up. The Cedar Wood is very very light. The floor seem kind of flimsy with some gaps between the joining sections. I laid down a thick rubber mat to help reduce draft from coming up. I sealed of the edges of the roof with Silicone, and vanished all the exterior wall. Hope this helps preserves the pup's home for a very years. Overall I'm happy with this Dog House.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Large Breed Dog House
customer_reviews.text: The dog house was easy to assemble. The floor is a little tricky in that there is a support in the center and no clear directions on how it should face. It is not square and I managed to put it on facing the wrong way. It was not hard to fix, but could have been avoided with one sentence in the instructions. The roof is excellent. Paint quality is rather poor, more primer than paint. I repainted the trim when I completed the assembly, but the main body (the red) needs to be painted as well. All parts were in the box and nothing was damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two cats. I put it together by myself just using a screw driver. It would have gone much faster if I had used an electric drill. It wasn't hard to put together. I bought a self heating mat to put in the bottom along with fleece blankets making a cozy bumper. It took a few days for my cats to start using it but now they go in it almost every night. I didn't use the door curtain but it is easy to turn so the wind doesn't come in. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AnnS

customer_reviews.title: Home for my two twit cat ferals.
customer_reviews.text: I could not let the two twit cats that adopted me after they were tnr'd live without a cozy house. I wasn't sure they'd take to it, but they did. I'm planning to insulate it better and make it more water tight by adding another coat of outdoor paint and sealant. When the weather turns, they'll be super snug. It was very easy to put together, but very much a pain to unpack, and the boxes arrived pretty damaged. But Twitcat 1 and Twitcat 2 are pretty happy in there.
customer_reviews.author: Pejutah

customer_reviews.title: A decent Doghouse
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling that if you wanted higher quality, you would start to see a rapid increase in price beyond this unit, or if you have the tools, to just build your own. the materials weren't the best, but they weren't horrible either. That said if you are a 'do it your-selfer' , I might have your own set of screws handy, and a drill driver, just to make things easier. I found a couple of areas that should have had pilot holes that were not drilled, of the hardware one screw, that broke, and I had to be careful not to strip the heads of the all the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and has held up well so far on my porch in AZ. Haven’t gone through a summer yet, but it’s covered from the sun most of the day. My German Shepard is comfortable going in and out of it. She only uses it to hide toys but I’m hoping that she’ll catch on and use it. I would recommend putting a mat inside. I got one that is slightly padded and easy to clean. I really like the looks of the house, too. The grey and white really brings some life to our tan, stucco home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog house. I'm very pleased with the quality. It came well packaged. Very easy to put together. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: For those with IKEA furniture experience
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but the instructions are written for someone who wasn’t going to read the instructions anyway. You can definitely tell they were not written by a native English speaker nor were they proofread by someone familiar with the language. It does look great and has withstood the past two tropical storms, but the wood comes with a pretty strong scent that took my dog a couple days to get over. Given the opportunity I’d order it again, but I’d skip the preproject drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cat house, horrible assembly instructions...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy - My two cats love it. I knocked it down a star due to the directions being very difficult to understand. Everything was included to put it together. It took a couple days to train the cats to go in and out through plastic door. I put their food in it for a few days and they gradually got used to going in and out.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing, too expensive for the cheap quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, you need power tools to put it together. It took me about 2 hours to put together and my boyfriend to help me. At first I was impressed but the platform broke off easily and did not last for a month. I bought this thinking it was durable for a husky. The bottom kept falling off. there was no contact information for seller to ask to get a replacement parts. PLEASE LOOK OVER OTHER DOG HOMES THIS ONE ISN’T IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Zahra

customer_reviews.title: it's been outdoor the entire time and I'm pretty pleased to say it's held up well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this doghouse so far for the summer, it's been outdoor the entire time and I'm pretty pleased to say it's held up well. I particularly enjoy the way the roof opens for easy cleaning. Assembly was easy and problem-free. My dog loves it as well. The elevated feet is a plus to protect against rot, dirt, bugs, etc. The sloping roof is a clever trick to drain away the rain. I haven't experienced any rains lately and I hope it repels water well.
customer_reviews.author: Alphanumeric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these dog houses for our two labradors. Putting the houses together was a breeze with the easy to read instructions. We kept the plastic flaps off for the summer because it didn't allow for very good air circulation. Once the weather starts turning cooler we will likely add those on to keep our dogs nice and toasty. The houses have held up nicely in the Texas heat, rain and wind.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: OK, well after reading some of the reviews before I ordered the large grey doghouse, I was very happy to see the unassembled product when I opened the box and unpacked the parts! The wood/sections were in great shape after shipping and considering the price, the wood quality was better than expected. Should be perfect for my Rottweiler in the California Central Valley weather conditions. If you get snow, you should insulate this dog house as others who have commented have done of course or spend more for an appropriate dog house for your more severe climate! I’ll add to my review after I put it together and move my 60 lb Rottie into it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Cat house
customer_reviews.text: Bgt for cat. Plastic strips over door are stiff. House is great for fall weather. Have not had snowfall yet, but did buy warming mat. Seems to be windproof. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Char

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that it just fits all the way in the back inside of my 4ftx10ft kennel. Other similar dog houses were over 40" wide and after measuring I only had 43" in the back of the kennel. Have a Border Collie, Tess, and she has plenty of room inside. Was easy to assemble, no parts missing, delivered via FedEx in a single flat box. My Grand Daughter calls it Tess's beach house. Would buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy to assemble, sturdiness is yet to be determined.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell how well it will hold up in the Florida sun, but it was honestly easy to assemble. it looks cute and the animals have been enjoying it. One of the little plastic parts of the foot came broken but it didn't make a big difference, it was still usable. Though all of animals have used it, I really got it for my tortoise. She had a hard time getting out so I made her a little stairway.
customer_reviews.author: taliscia

customer_reviews.title: Don't know about my dog but my CAT loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally bought this for my cat. It's nice and roomy for my fluffy kitties and they love it! I have this one under the eave of my house to help protect it from the elements. I have other cat houses from this same manufacturer and it does get a bit weather-beaten from the sun during the very hot months, but very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie S

customer_reviews.title: Great house, hardware not the strongest
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog house for the price. My one complaint is the screws were not very strong, two broke on me while assembling and it wasn't due to pressure. The hinges aren't the best either, they don't stay open at top so you'd need to help it stay open if you need to clean or put in dog bed, not a deal breaker though. Other than that assembly was easy and pieces lined together properly. The wood is sturdy and the style/color is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It seems pretty sturdy and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I needed a drill to make complete holes so I could put the screw in properly. I am not construction saavy so it took me a long while to put the first on together and a lot quicker on the second one. It seems pretty sturdy and decent quality! Definitely not an eye sore like many can be!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for large breeds
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and thought this would be a good pick but unfortunately it wasn't. My German shepherd is already to big and he's not even 2years old. The floor is rickety so we doesn't stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not insulated
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a (spayed and released) feral cat that found her way to our property. The house is very cute. I'm not disappointed exactly. However, although it is quite nice, I only gave it three stars because it is not insulated at all. It would keep an animal dry, but do nothing to keep out the cold. We were able to put a styrophome cooler inside it and filled that with straw and cedar chips. So, if you're able to modify it to make it more functional, it is an attractive little house.
customer_reviews.author: amelia mine

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Easy to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: I got the smallest house with the little ‘front porch’. Quick delivery and super easy to put together. I bought it for a feral cat I’ve seen wandering around the area. I hope he likes it! Most definitely will need a drill or battery operated screwdriver. But all the pieces are marked and the instructions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our backyard that has full sunlight most of the day with no shade for the dogs while we are on the patio. This dog house was really easy to set up. We left the door flap off to keep it cooler during the summer but plan to put it on during the winter months. It was missing a screw but we found one on hand that worked as a replacement. I also like that the legs do not touch the ground and have rubber caps to prevent rotting. I would recommend to anyone looking for a good, well crafted dog house.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it might last a year or two
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it might last a year or two. One of the pneumatic cylinders that holds the lid has already ripped out of the side. Not sure when or how. Built two of them so far and they aren't hard to put together. Just not sure how long it will last as the wood is pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in hoping to receive what was pictured... Instead I received a two story cat house thing that I cannot use. Very disappointed.... I am choosing to have faith and order again. *eye roll* I will update when I receive my second order. I hope they will get it right the second time. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: The actual dog house looks awesome but quality of material and build is terrible. Looks like it can easily be broken. Cheap wood and weak.
customer_reviews.author: m130jordan

customer_reviews.title: Smart Design
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: The lid hinges up like a linen chest, and the floor is removable with no tools, so you'll be able to keep the dog house sanitary. Assembly was easy. Looks are subjective of course, but I feel it looks nice. It was east to train my dog to use it by hiding treats in it. Con's: the wood is thin and the dog house couldn't take rough handling. I needed both a drill and a saw to make minor quality corrections to the kit. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Attorri

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive dog house in city setting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Well built. Some screw instructions should have matching descriptors in the double sided instructions. Although nice use of pictures. For $10, I used thick plastic on window and used 2 pieces for doorway. And one piece to cover the flooring of the inside unit to trap air out during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Family

customer_reviews.title: Just over a year
customer_reviews.text: Had this product just over a year and I liked it at first was easy to assemble but it really did not hold up well at all the bottom inside boards rotten real quick due to rain and it didnt last the winter. The roof didnt last much longer, the hinges popped off out of nowhere but once I looked at it the roof closer was also rotted out.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, top doesn't stay completely closed, had to add magnet latches to prevent lid from popping up. Have four Ferrell cats using it. Will definitely need to add something for insulation before winter. Other products like this have an insulation kit sold separately, haven't found one made specifically for this house.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fits my German Shepherd!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 70lb German Shepherd with plenty of room to spare. Lightweight, but sturdy enough to withstand the elements. Dog loves it. Living in Southwest we get torrential downpours and long periods of hot sun. It's been several months and nothing is breaking or fading.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy s

customer_reviews.title: Shop Around
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned a dog house before I got this one, I didn’t know what to expect. From my observation it looks good, but it is made of cheep wood. The roof broke with a windy storm we had. I wanted to return it, but it seemed it would be too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: JNP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shelter for feral cats
customer_reviews.text: We have several feral cats that we feed and take care of. This house is perfect for them. It's sturdy, yet easy to assemble and clean (you can lift the entire top lid off if you need to). We get a fair amount of snow/ice and this does the trick by keeping the elements off of them. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST TORTOISE HOUSE EVER
customer_reviews.text: My dogs stay inside, but my tortoise stays outside. Summers are always really rainy in New Orleans, and we needed something for the tortoise to escape the rain. We added a little ramp to the entry way so my tortoise could climb in and out. The hinged roof is perfect for easy feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi V.

customer_reviews.title: East of assembly and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this for indoor use of our car litter box and storage of cat food and the litter. Easy to put together and my hubs did it solo. It first perfectly in the nook we had planned for it. The top lips up so cleaning the cat litter is a breeze!!! Will up load pics when it’s day light out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and not a moment too soon as it rained the next morning after I assembled it. My puppy spent the duration of the rain in his new house and now sleeps in kit at night. It is too soon to tell how the product will hold up in the Oklahoma weather as I have only had it for a couple of days (hence only 4 stars for weatherproof) but so far it held up perfect in the first rain episode.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little house! I got it for my feral kitty as his “summer house”. He has a kitty tube (insulated) for winter and this one could be insulated too. It has a real roof and I put a bed on top of that as a sundeck for those pretty days. Took two of us to put together but wasn’t difficult.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Well made outdoor house. We use it for a feral cat who adopted us. Easy to put together. There was a piece of wood that is for the floor that had a split in it .Customer service is great, They respond quickly. Price is wonderful! Thank you Petsfit!
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopper3

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, we like it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, my mom helped me and we spent around 30min. It has a good smell like real wood, not processed with chemicals. Our dog likes it, good size for a 24 pound dog. I like the fact that we can open the roof and play with the dog and put her comforter and toys inside, easy to clean too, it is really well made. Will updated few months later to see how it stands under Florida's rainy and hot summers.
customer_reviews.author: DLY

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The house is decent looking once you get it together, however, the one I ordered was too small for our dog to even go in despite reviews and dimensions saying otherwise, so it is now a great cat house. The only construction issue is the coating is falling off the roof from the time you open the box and gets everywhere, so I would recommend putting together outside. The instructions and parts packaging are horrible, but it’s not hard to figure out if you have your own tools and have put things together before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional and great size!
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to put together. I bought the insulation kit but didn’t use it yet. I have a 3 months old husky pup that loves the yard and I wanted her to be able to spend a few hours in the yard while we are busy or not home. I bought a pad to put inside and she loves it. Great quality and the pad stayed dry after heavy rains.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Vaxman

customer_reviews.title: Flemish giant Bunny loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Flemish Giant Bunny and he loves it. He tunnels under it and snuggles up in it. I love that the top opens for easy cleaning and the boards come out the bottom to hose off. We have been getting a ton of rain and it has stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mcdme

customer_reviews.title: Using it for my 2 ducks
customer_reviews.text: I brought home 2 muscovy ducks thinking they could join my chickens inside their coop. I was wrong because my chickens are jerks and wouldn't let the ducks join the flock so I had to improvise and this little dog house did the trick nicely. Its made from good materials and seems weatherproof so far after quite a few rainstorms. Its plenty big for my 2 fairly large ducks.
customer_reviews.author: vpimp719

customer_reviews.title: Not weather resistant!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't leave reviews but in this case I was really disappointed in this product! So decided to leave one....so I loved the style and look of this dog house (the reason I spent the extra money on it) but wished I'd bought a plastic dog house instead. The dog house was easy to assemble but didn't last but about 6 months. Supposedly it's made to withstand the weather, not the case in my opinion. It ended up getting a giant hole in the roof of the house. Oh and the dog that was using this house was a older dog with a very calm disposition. Wished I'd saved my money and bought a plastic house.
customer_reviews.author: Lakin Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIS PRODUCT -- DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: This is on the flimsy side. I am not sure how long it will last. My dog doesn't really like it all that much. My husband says that he can make a doggy palace for the price I paid for this. :/ UPDATE: Didi not last six months. This is a terrible product. Everything is breaking down very quickly. The hardware is not holding up and the wood is splintering and otherwise working loose. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Frances

customer_reviews.title: Roof hinge connection ingenious and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took me half hour to put together. Roof hinge connection ingenious and easy to assemble. I stapled thin aluminum foil backed insulation to deal the floor and may flip it over and caulk cracks in bottom to keep out insects. I caulked all the corners inside and out for wind. A pad in there and our sweet boy just loves it. It'll be his outside house. 😁
customer_reviews.author: ReedTwanger

customer_reviews.title: Buy with low expectations
customer_reviews.text: We like the design but upon arrival the item was slightly damaged. The damage was not enough to return or not enough to allow me to assemble it properly. However frustrating, at the price the expectations is for the item to be delivered in good standing.
customer_reviews.author: Noa

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and looks super insulated but...
customer_reviews.text: This product fits right into the dog house and it really snug. It looks super warm and comfy. It lasted only three days mostly since our two dogs chewed it up by then otherwise it would have been a great purchase. So beware if you have dogs that love to chew and not always what you want them to chew...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly with 2 people-- took maybe 20 minutes. Dogs like it to sit on top of..... perhaps the will go inside. I don't think they like the rain flap at the door. I may take it off. But it really looks nice and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: natcares

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and keeps my dog house warm. This definitely gets soaked easily. My dog actually hates being in her dog house for more than 10 seconds unless it is to get food or a drink of water, so for me this was a worthless purchase. Feel free to contact me if you want to buy my dog house and insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Señorita

customer_reviews.title: well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my rather large Tom cat.. he's yet to believe it's not a trap but it's very well made and I'm very happy with the way it goes together.. fit and finish seem top notch.. paint has a distressed look to it on both the gray and the white but that's no problem..
customer_reviews.author: FrankP

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 3 feral cats. Very well built. Hubby not handy. But he had no trouble with assembly, even the hinged lid. Great roof! Water tight and cute. Hinged lid allows easy access for cleaning. Most important, the cats are using it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Holifield

customer_reviews.title: FRAME CRACKING AFTER 2 WEEKS - POOR PAINT FINISH OVERALL -- OVERPRICED -- UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is a regret and is nothing special. In less than 2 weeks of it actually being assembled, the front frame is cracking badly. Seller gave me a $40 refund which I now updated my review from 2 star to 3 star since they helped make matters right. Still it's super cheap brittle Chinese wood but will hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: RoboCup

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I received all parts in the box without any discrepancies. House seems sturdy enough for my 50 lb Husky. I only bought it for the rainy season and from what I can tell my dog likes it. It rarely rains where I'm at. The clear plastic door flaps were easy to install and are very sturdy. I did add an extra layer of clear Flex Seal just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Was good till it didnt last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Im super disappointed. I bought this dog house in May when I first got my puppy. The house was good all summer my dog loved her house till now in December. Some rains have come this season and the dog house screws and wood started to coke off and apart. The house is not out in the open it's under a roof on the back porch and somehow stared falling apart with the weather. As of now I'm trying to put the house together as best possible cause my poor baby has no house to sleep in this weather. Note some screws were already on some parts of the house and screwed off.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Removable bottom padding
customer_reviews.text: I do like how this fit, and went into the dog house. Beware though, if you have a dog that likes to chew, there is an insert at the bottom for them to lay on, and keep warm. This is as easy for you to remove as it is for the dog. My dog took a few days to want to go in, and a few days more to learn this. Woke up and she had chewed the bottom layer's corners up. Now the house isn't as warm and she doesn't like to sleep in it anymore. What would make this better would be if the bottom stayed down just as much as the padding on the sides do.
customer_reviews.author: TinyDov

customer_reviews.title: Save your.mo eye and buy it built locally for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wood. Very small. Nor large dog house as daid in the description. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emoni7

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my feral cats. A few have gone in & seem to like it. Since winter is coming I cover it with a tarp so I can try to keep them warmer. It will also be easier to clean with the top opening. Update: Not even 2 years later & the roof inside is rotting
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Dog house was very easy to put together. I did it all by myself. :0) Very nicely built. A couple of holes not drilled, but the wood is soft enough to add the legs on the bottom piece. I wish I could take away half a star for the late arrival (paid for quicker shipping), but I really do love this dog house. I can open it from the top and add the bedding and the roof will keep the rain off. It also comes with plastic strips to add for a door, but not sure my dog will use it. Nice extra for keeping the dog house clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: The assembly on this was a nightmare, holes did not match up, pieces were not cut properly...thankfully my husband is very "handy" and was able to work around the issues, BUT the most disappointing or should I say misleading thing is the pictures show two dogs comfortably sharing the house....We have 2 small chihuahuas and once we assembled it we knew they would never fit in it together! They sleep in a small size dog crate at night so they are used to being together in small spaces, but this was ridiculous. Big Bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Scully Blank

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Great Dog House!! Purchased in January 2018. Easy to assemble [2 people]. My dog wouldn't use it first two days. I installed a new pad and screwed her dry food bucket in the house and fed her canned food bowl in the house only. She started using the house on the fourth day and now I can't get her out of it! we have had some heavy rain the last couple of weeks and the inside is bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Trickey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tiny screws, small hinges that broke and bent almost immediately. The flooring was slats of wood that my dogs didn’t like (so maybe your dogs might) however when stepped on they would raise up from the other end causing them not to want to enter. Photo is with hinges attached-won’t close properly because lids hinges are bent. Probably happened after maybe 6-10 lid openings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be ware. This dog house looks nice and does assemble pretty easy. However, the quality of the wood is terrible. Like most products made in China this is no exception. The wood is very soft and splits very easy. The white trim is painted with a single coat. I chose to add two more coats. I also water treated the exterior. I added plastic sheeting (bisquin) and 1/8" plywood on the inside for extra insulation plus a floor. Overall, I'm disappointed in this product. Just poor quality. Not recommended. Shop for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Dog and His Owners Both Like It!
customer_reviews.text: The house was easy to assemble. It has plenty of room for Barkley, our 22 pound Shih Tzu, shown in the picture. Barkley really likes his new house!
customer_reviews.author: Wumpus55

customer_reviews.title: Larger Breeds will only fit if they are early puppy stage.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the house. Was easy assembly and looked so cute. Arrived on time. However I do not believe that this would hold a 130 lb dog as stated somewhere in the description. Also if you are buying for a larger breed this will not fit them. I luckily was just buying for my 3 month old, great Dane puppy as a temporary situation until I could finish building his house. He loved this house. It has kept him warm and snuggly for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Chels Dabomb

customer_reviews.title: Need a part replaced asap please .....
customer_reviews.text: I need one of the hinges replaced...upon inspection realized the inside that slips onto the ball attachment is damaged to the point of being unable to attach ... the other damages were easy to fix being cosmetic and minor... cute dog house :) house super easy to put together ...including placement of hinges...they must be installed evenly is the trick.. TY!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Guenot

customer_reviews.title: the seller contacted me and offered e a replacement house great customer service I’m very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller contacted me and offered e a replacement house great customer service I’m very impressed. I really did like this dog house at the beginning even though it was sort of flimsy. However it did not last, We bought this house back in October 2017 and the roof is already falling apart. It is almost as if the roof was glued in ? What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: denvega

customer_reviews.title: The creator deserves a Nobel prize
customer_reviews.text: This insert was easy to install. Fits perfectly in the doghouse it’s made for and kept our pet warm and cozy this Winter. Couldn’t be happier and so glad someone had the insight and initiative to design this product. Must be a true dog lover!
customer_reviews.author: literaturescout

customer_reviews.title: Cute 💜
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice dog house 💜 . I was able to fit my 1 year old Husky in there with a little room to spare & he weighs about 50 lbs. 🌟 ! My main concern was if he would be able to fit in there comfortably & luckily , it’s a perfect size! As far as the sturdiness , I think I would’ve felt more confident in my purchase if the boards were a little thicker. The roof seems really great for weather conditions but overall it’s a nice house.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Rubio

product_meta.title: Petsfit Dog House, Dog House Outdoor
product_meta.description: Size:Large/45.6" x 30.9" x 32.1"| Color:RedBasic information: wood: natural cedar paint: water-based paint roof: asphalt roofing outer Dimension: S: 33.7L x 22.6W x 22.9H; M: 40.8L x 26W x 27.6H; l: 45.6L x 30.9W x 32.1H note: take photo of the damaged part and send the photo to seller designs and functions: 1. Treated with water-based paint which is safer for your pet. 2. Wine Red and white trim. 3. Off-center entrance provides increased shelter and more space for turning around. 4.Small size Can hold most small dogs; medium and large size can hold medium dogs like Golden Retriever; 5. Easy to set up with just a few steps. Warranty: 1. Petsfit adhere to return policy. 2. Within 30 days, any quality problems, we will take full responsibility. 3. Any damages happened during shipping period, we will burden the shipping and return cost. Attention: please measure your pet and check the inner dimension.
feature_bullets: Easy to put together with predrilled holes. Any damages, please contact Petsfit directly for replacements within 1 year
The large dog house is slanted waterproof roof, so rainfall will not sit on top for outdoor use directly
Top roof is easy to open for cleaning and groove ensures good drainage
Adjustable elevated feet will keep dog house away from moisture and bottom slat floor allow air to move in summer
Front entrance is easy to access and door flap is included

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
